definitions.title: vb.denom. Pō‘l.
definitions.body: chant a [[קִינׇה]];—Pf. 3 pl. consec. [[וְקוֹנְנוּ]] Ez Eze 27:32 ([[עַל]] pers.), sf. (cogn.) [[וְקוֹנְוּהָ]] Eze 32:16; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיְקׂנֵן]] 2Sa 1:17 (c. acc. cogn. + [[עַל]] pers.), cf. ([[עַל]] pers. only), 2Ch 35:25 and ([[אֶל]] pers. ) 2Sa 3:33; 3 fpl. [[תְּקוֹנֶנׇּה]] c. acc. cogn., Ez Eze 32:16, + [[עַל]] pers. v:Eze 32:16; Pt. as subst. Je 9:16 (professional) wailing women.
